org.openimaj.ml.annotation.svm

Class SVMAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.AbstractAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
      • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.BatchAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
        • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.svm.SVMAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
  • Type Parameters:
    OBJECT - The object being annotated
    ANNOTATION - The type of the annotation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<ANNOTATION,OBJECT>, Annotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>, BatchTrainer<Annotated<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>>

    public class SVMAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
extends BatchAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
    Wraps the libsvm SVM and provides basic positive/negative annotation for a single class.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
